{docbook}
<highlights>
<itemizedlist>
      <listitem>
        <para>
          <emphasis role="bold">
            <link linkend="Dev_CMIS.features.Integration_with_eXoWCM">Integration with eXo WCM</link>
          </emphasis> </para>
          <para>This section will show you how to integrate between eXo WCM and CMIS via <emphasis role="bold"><link linkend="Dev_CMIS.features.JCR_namespaces_nodetypes">JCR namespaces and nodetypes</link></emphasis>, <emphasis role="bold"><link linkend="Dev_CMIS.features.WCM_drives_as_CMIS_repositories"> WCM drives as CMIS Repositories</link></emphasis>,
		  <emphasis role="bold"><link linkend="Dev_CMIS.features.WCM_symlinks">WCM Symlinks</link></emphasis>, <emphasis role="bold"><link linkend="Dev_CMIS.features.Search">CMIS search</link></emphasis>, and <emphasis role="bold"><link linkend="Dev_CMIS.features.Modify_WCM_via_CMIS">how to modify WCM via CMIS</link></emphasis>.
        </para>
      </listitem>
      <listitem>
        <para>
          <emphasis role="bold">
            <link linkend="Dev_CMIS.features.CMIS_domain_model">CMIS Domain Model</link>
          </emphasis> </para>
          <para>Necessary information about the CMIS Domain Model and some of its common entities.</para>
      </listitem>
      <listitem>
        <para>
          <emphasis role="bold">
            <link linkend="Dev_CMIS.features.CMIS_services">CMIS Services</link>
          </emphasis> </para>
          <para>Introduction to the CMIS Services, including Repository, Navigation, Object, Multi-filing, Discovery, Versioning, Relationship, Policy and ACL.</para>
      </listitem>
    </itemizedlist>
</highlights>
